title: Switching $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: We must now substitute all instances for $$x$$ by $$y$$ and instances of $$y$$ by $$x$$. $$x=\sqrt{2y+1}$$

title: Solving for $$y$$
text: Now, we must manipulate the equation and solve for $$y$$. $$y=\frac{x^2-1}{2}$$
speech: Now, we must manipulate the equation and solve for  y .  y, is equal to fraction, x squared minus 1, over 2,
